# MdCodeSpan Constructors

**Declaring Type:** [MdCodeSpan](../index.md)

Initializes a new instance of [MdCodeSpan](../index.md)

```csharp
public MdCodeSpan(string text);
```

## Parameters

`text`  string

The content of the code span. The value will not be escaped.
